setting: A picturesque coastal town with dark secrets hidden beneath its charming facade.

lore.title: The Thomas Family Disappearance
lore.summary: The mysterious vanishing of the prominent Thomas family twenty years ago, which remains unsolved and continues to haunt the town.

historyLog.description: The player checked into Harbour Point Hotel, claiming to be a tourist but actually investigating the disappearance of journalist Maya Chen.
A local fisherman discovered an unidentified body washed up on Siren's Cove Beach.

notes: Blackwater Bay is preparing for its annual Founder's Day Festival, but tensions run high beneath the surface. The recent disappearance of journalist Maya Chen has stirred up old memories and fears related to similar cases over the decades.
